replies.body: I am a simple man.  I see Fate Stay Night, so have an upvote.
Lol same, I saw the thumbnail from the boards and was like "oh is that Gilgamesh?", clicked on the post and saw Berserker and I be like "o yea here we go"
this thread lead me to watch the whole fate stay night series it was actualy pretty good
So who has the bigger ego gilgamesh or aurelion sol?
Gilgamesh cuz when Aurelion sol dies he says "i never said i was infallible" Gilgamesh would never say something like that

Oh right. I'll accept that
But doesn't ko gil (young gilgamesh) apologize for his older forms assholery?
that was child gilgamesh after he drank the potion of eternal life also technically that wasnt really gilgamesh it was all just a ploy it was a world created to keep Lancers first master alive
Nasuverse rule #1 everything is cannon.
that is one big rule so yah i guess gilgamesh is tide if you count his child self
{{champion:429}} : hop
{{champion:19}} : Goddamnit.

I never understood how on earth Gilgamesh ended up classified as the Assassin in Stay Night. At least he vaguely made sense as Archer in Zero.

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect

in unlimited blade works hes just a rogue servant so he techincally should have a class or just still be an archer.The reason he can stay so long is he has EX level independent action no one can ever give him a single order since he can reject them and he can stay on earth for years

So was he just kind of taking up one of the seven spots, but not bound to a particular class? He was more or less exempt from the usual summoning rules because he was basically leftover from the previous war?

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect

Explained in the original Fate story (not UBW or HF) that he was being sustained by the life force of all the children who used to live in the orphanage (the one converted to a church by Kirei) Also he doesn't take up a spot because it's a different grail

> [{quoted}](name=Cerbearus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=7vhEsK5x,comment-id=0005000000000001,timestamp=2016-06-20T03:49:38.142+0000)
>
> Explained in the original Fate story (not UBW or HF) that he was being sustained by the life force of all the children who used to live in the orphanage (the one converted to a church by Kirei) Also he doesn't take up a spot because it's a different grail

Original? Do you made Fate/Night Zero or whatever it's called? Cause I just started watching UBW...
No, the Fate/Stay Night Visual Novel had 3 routes, the first being Fate, the second Unlimited Blade Works, and the third Heaven's Feel. HF does not yet have an anime adaptation but the first two do.

> [{quoted}](name=Cerbearus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=7vhEsK5x,comment-id=000500000000000100000002,timestamp=2016-06-25T00:59:39.412+0000)
>
> No, the Fate/Stay Night Visual Novel had 3 routes, the first being Fate, the second Unlimited Blade Works, and the third Heaven's Feel. HF does not yet have an anime adaptation but the first two do.

Was it a visual novel or something? :o

Yep, came out in like 2004. You can pirate a translated PC version (I don't think there is any other way to get it, it was rereleased on vita but only in Japanese)
Warning that it is very NSFW and the animes replace the sex scenes with really awkward exchanges lol
Fate/Zero is a prequel that should be watched.
there is a older version its ok but its like watching full metal alchemist brother hood then watching the first one its just not the same

he was exempt from the rules since he was already summoned also a small fact gilgamesh is nicer (i stretch it) nice if the world was so shitty he claims the world as his own so in mordern times with the world being so polluted he is especially mad hence why he wanted to destroy the world.In the visual novel fate strange fake (a fake holly grail war) gilgamesh is basically a main protagonist.Also in fate Extra CC gilgamesh is playable and is a main protaginist who is much nicer then his fate stay night counter part

Well Caster from Extra can also be a Berserker in Grand Order, and those two classes are about as far apart as you can get. So I think we should look at classes as less of a rule and more of a guideline.

Gilgamesh was never Assassin. He's still Archer, but stayed from the previous war rather than being summoned for the Fifth War, which means that there are eight servants. The Fifth War's (False) Assassin is Sasaki Kojirou.

Oh, he counted? I thought he was simply summoned anyway, outside the rules of the war, and therefore didn't really take up one of the 7 spots. Rule Breaker was involved, of course, but I still didn't think of him as being a proper Servant.

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect

A+ for Fate/stay night reference (I just started watching that this week, almost done with it, YEEE!)

A- cause FUCK MAN HE KILLED ILLYA AND BERSERKER I LOVED THEM THEY WERE LIKE ANNIE AND TIBBERS DUUUUD.

lol that spolier going to hurt a lot of people who havent watched but gilgamesh is my favorite character.And To be fair i hate illya cuz she reminds me of annie Also Illiay is like 18 in this part watch fate kaleid for more illiay she is liek the main protag and this takes place in another world ive herd its decent
